event.title: Chemnitzer Linux-Tage in Chemnitz, Germany
event.body: Chemnitzer Linux-Tage is one of Germany's biggest Free Software conference and takes place on 10 and 11 March in the central building of the University in Chemnitz, Reichenhainer Straße 90. FSFE is present with an information booth, and on Sunday, 11 March, at 10:00, Room V2, Björn Schießle, FSFE's Germany coordinator, speaks about software freedom in the cloud. Admission to the whole event is free.
